segments.text: I notice the stool the boy is standing on, and it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s tilted to one side, and he’s reaching so high for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m afraid he’s going to fall and hurt himself at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, waiting for a cookie, but she doesn’t seem to notice the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing from the sink, and the floor is getting slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate, completely unaware of what’s happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to do something, but I’m frozen in place, watching it all unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is filled with tension, and I can’t look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope everyone stays safe and no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
